mapper.insert: INSERT INTO code_analysis_results ( algorithm_record_id, summary, time_complexity, space_complexity, complexity_explanation, patterns, algorithm_intuition, pitfalls, improvements, refactor_provided, refactor_code, refactor_explanation, score, analyzed_at ) VALUES ( #{algorithmRecordId}, #{summary}, #{timeComplexity}, #{spaceComplexity}, #{complexityExplanation}, #{patterns}, #{algorithmIntuition}, #{pitfalls}, #{improvements}, #{refactorProvided}, #{refactorCode}, #{refactorExplanation}, #{score}, #{analyzedAt} )
